alert.note: Alert for Badlands Area; Bennett County Area; Custer County Plains; Eastern Foot Hills; Haakon County Area; Mellette and Todd Counties; Pine Ridge Area; Tripp County; West Central Plains (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued February 08 at 5:23AM MST until February 08 at 5:00PM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT TODAY FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 324, 325, 326, 329, 331, 332, 333, 334, AND 335... .Strong northwest winds will continue today across much of the western South Dakota plains. Gusts up to 65 mph are expected. Temperatures rising into the 50s today will combine with very dry air to result in relative humidities of 20 to 25 percent. The dry air, extreme winds, and extremely dry fuels with snow cover lacking will result in dangerous fire weather conditions today. ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST /6 PM CST/ THIS AFTERNOON FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 324, 325, 326, 329, 331, 332, 333, 334, AND 335... * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zones 324 Eastern Foot Hills, 325 Custer County Plains, 326 Pine Ridge Area, 329 West Central Plains, 331 Haakon County Area, 332 Badlands Area, 333 Bennett County Area, 334 Mellette and Todd Counties and 335 Tripp County. * WINDS...Northwest 30 to 45 mph with gusts up to 65 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 25 percent. * IMPACTS...The combination of gusty winds and low relative humidity would produce critical fire weather conditions.
info.instruction: A red flag warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Badlands Area; Bennett County Area; Custer County Plains; Eastern Foot Hills; Haakon County Area; Mellette and Todd Counties; Pine Ridge Area; Tripp County; West Central Plains
